content: row 22 26 26 30 sts next row rs cast off 6 7 8 10 sts knit to end next row ws purl repeat previous 2 row once more cast off final 8 9 10 10 sts left side place leftmost 33 37 37 41 sts back onto 4 5mm needle leave remaining sts on holder row 1 ws join yarn a to arm edge and purl 33 37 37 41 sts row 2 rs cast off 3 sts work to end row 3purl row 4cast off 2sts work to end row 5-6as row 3-4 row 7purl row 8k1 ssk knit to end row 9-14as row 7-8 work 8 further row st st ending with rs row 22 26 26 30 sts next row ws cast off 6 7 8 10 sts purl to end next row ws knit repeat previous 2 row once more cast off final 8 9 10 10 sts sleeves using yarn a and 4mm needles cast on 40 45 50 55 sts work 6 row st st change to 4 5mm needles and work a further 5 row st st ending with ws row fold the knitting in half lengthways and pick up and knit each cast on stitch together k2tog with the live stitches on your needles *work 5 row ending with a ws row row 6k1 m1r knit to 1 st before end m1l * 42 47 52 57 sts repeat from * to * 4 4 5 15 times **work 7 row next row rs k1 m1r knit to 1 stbefore end m1l ** repeat from ** to ** 8 8 8 0 times 64 69 76 85 sts continue straight until sleeve measures 43 44 44 46 cm / 17 17 5 17 5 18 ins from hem shape sleevecap cast off 4 4 6 8 sts at beg of next 2 row decrease 1 st at each end of next 2 2 2 3 row decrease 1 st at each end of next 2 4 4 5 rs row 48 49 52 53 sts work 34 33 36 39 row decrease 1 st at each end of next 4 rs row decrease 1 st at each end of every row 4 times cast off remaining sts 4 finishing weave in ends and block gently using mattress stitch seam shoulders together insert sleeve caps into arm holes and mattress stitch in place again using mattress stitch to attach work from sleeve cuffs up to armpit and down body one side at a time collar using 4 5mm circular needles and yarn a pick up and knit the rem sts from the stitch holder at the front of the neckline pick up and knit 14 16 16 16 sts evenly up side of collar 27sts along back and 14 16 16 16 sts down rem side working in the round knit a further 6 row change to 4mm needles and knit a further 7 row next round*k2tog tbl slip worked st back
